hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that arbitrary code execution leads to the credits sequence.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #2# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: Remember that time you did that really embarrassing thing?^${12 68 3A}Yikes.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a lone #scrub in Death Mountain Crater# sells #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a solitary #Cow#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides the #Market Bazaar#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that quest guidance can be found at a talking rock.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the song written in the #royal tomb# is #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Stray Fairy#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Double Eye Switch Room Pot 2

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Piece of the Triforce# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #0# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #2# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Prelude of Light#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hidden Ceiling Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #generic grotto#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Kokiri Sword# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Flame Maze Left Side Pot 3

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Broken Sword# can be found in #Goron City#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Gerudo Card# can be found in #Goron City#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Green Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #0# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that Mido is easily confused by sick flips.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Recovery Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well West Inner Room Flying Pot 2

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Thieves' Hideout# is on the path of #gold#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right
